title: Russian Attack on Energy Facilities Cuts Power To Million Homes In Ukraine
content: As stated by Ukraine's president Vlodymyr Zelenskyy, cluster munitions were particularly used against civilians and energy infrastructure. He has called the attack out as a "very mean escalation" in the conflict.
summary: As stated by Ukraine's president Vlodymyr Zelenskyy, cluster munitions were particularly used against civilians and energy infrastructure. He has called the attack out as a "very mean escalation" in the conflict.

title: Bangladesh High Court Refuses To Ban ISKCON In Country: Report
content: The High Court on Thursday refused to ban ISKCON's activities in Bangladesh, a local newspaper reported days after a lawyer was killed in a clash between security personnel and supporters of a Hindu leader arrested on sedition charges.
summary: The High Court on Thursday refused to ban ISKCON's activities in Bangladesh, a local newspaper reported days after a lawyer was killed in a clash between security personnel and supporters of a Hindu leader arrested on sedition charges.

title: Woman Sneaks Onto Plane And Flies From US To Paris Without Boarding Pass
content: A female stowaway on Tuesday bypassed multiple security checkpoints at New York's John F Kennedy International Airport and onto a Paris-bound Delta Airlines flight without a boarding pass or identification.
summary: A female stowaway on Tuesday bypassed multiple security checkpoints at New York's John F Kennedy International Airport and onto a Paris-bound Delta Airlines flight without a boarding pass or identification.

title: 'Hindu Monk's Arrest Unjust, Must Be Freed': Bangladesh Ex-PM Sheikh Hasina
content: Bangladesh's ousted prime minister Sheikh Hasina today spoke out about the arrest of a Hindu priest in her country. She also spoke about the death of a lawyer who was killed during clashes arising out a protest after the monk's arrest.
summary: Bangladesh's ousted prime minister Sheikh Hasina today spoke out about the arrest of a Hindu priest in her country. She also spoke about the death of a lawyer who was killed during clashes arising out a protest after the monk's arrest.

title: US Embassy In Pakistan Issues Security Alert For Peshawar
content: The US Mission here has issued a security alert urging its citizens not to visit Peshawar in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province in northwest Pakistan until December 16 due to "security concerns."
summary: The US Mission here has issued a security alert urging its citizens not to visit Peshawar in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province in northwest Pakistan until December 16 due to "security concerns."

title: What Centre Told Parliament About Attacks On Hindus, Temples In Bangladesh
content: As incidents of violence and vandalism against the minority Hindu community see a sharp upturn in Bangladesh, questions were asked in the Parliament of India out of concern for human rights violations.
summary: As incidents of violence and vandalism against the minority Hindu community see a sharp upturn in Bangladesh, questions were asked in the Parliament of India out of concern for human rights violations.

title: Oscar-Winning Actor Charlize Theron's To Lend Her Instagram For HIV Awareness
content: A young South African activist living with HIV will take over Oscar-winning actress Charlize Theron's Instagram account on World AIDS Day, the United Nations said Thursday.
summary: A young South African activist living with HIV will take over Oscar-winning actress Charlize Theron's Instagram account on World AIDS Day, the United Nations said Thursday.

title: Blizzard Leaves South Korea Buried In Snow, 3rd Highest In Nearly 120 Years
content: A blizzard has left South Korea grappling with very heavy snowfall for a second day on Thursday, with dozens of flights cancelled, ferry operations suspended and at least five reported dead in a cold snap, though conditions showed signs of easing.
summary: A blizzard has left South Korea grappling with very heavy snowfall for a second day on Thursday, with dozens of flights cancelled, ferry operations suspended and at least five reported dead in a cold snap, though conditions showed signs of easing.

title: "You Chose Well": Vir Das' Sarcastic Remark On Elon Musk, Donald Trump
content: Actor-comedian Vir Das made history this week as the first Indian to host the International Emmy Awards in New York. From tech billionaire Elon Musk to US President-elect Donald Trump, Mr Das' monologue spared no one.
summary: Actor-comedian Vir Das made history this week as the first Indian to host the International Emmy Awards in New York. From tech billionaire Elon Musk to US President-elect Donald Trump, Mr Das' monologue spared no one.

title: Lebanese Head Home As Israel-Hezbollah Truce Takes Hold
content: Tens of thousands of Lebanese displaced by the war between Israel and Hezbollah headed back to their devastated towns and villages Wednesday as a ceasefire took hold.
summary: Tens of thousands of Lebanese displaced by the war between Israel and Hezbollah headed back to their devastated towns and villages Wednesday as a ceasefire took hold.

title: Colombian Navy Seizes 225 Tons Of Cocaine, Unearths Pacific Trafficking Route
content: Authorities from dozens of countries seized 225 metric tons of cocaine in a six-week mega-operation where they unearthed a new Pacific trafficking route from South America to Australia, the Colombian Navy said Wednesday.
summary: Authorities from dozens of countries seized 225 metric tons of cocaine in a six-week mega-operation where they unearthed a new Pacific trafficking route from South America to Australia, the Colombian Navy said Wednesday.

title: Deli Bal: A Look At The Expensive 'Mad Honey' From Turkey
content: Used as folk medicine, a spoonful of deli bal on a daily basis lowers blood pressure and is also used as a sexual stimulant.
summary: Used as folk medicine, a spoonful of deli bal on a daily basis lowers blood pressure and is also used as a sexual stimulant.

title: Energy Sector "Under Massive Enemy Attack", Says Ukraine As Russia Attacks
content: Ukraine's power infrastructure was "under massive enemy attack" on Thursday, the energy minister said, after a countrywide air raid alert was declared due to incoming missiles.
summary: Ukraine's power infrastructure was "under massive enemy attack" on Thursday, the energy minister said, after a countrywide air raid alert was declared due to incoming missiles.

title: China's Xi Suspends Top military Official Miao Hua Over Corruption Allegations
content: Miao Hua, a top Chinese military official, has been removed from office and is suspected of "serious violations of discipline", Beijing said.
summary: Miao Hua, a top Chinese military official, has been removed from office and is suspected of "serious violations of discipline", Beijing said.

title: New MethaneSAT Images Reveal Shocking Details About Methane Emissions
content: The MethaneSAT satellite zooms around the Earth 15 times a day and searches for leaks of methane, the invisible gas that has been warming the planet.
summary: The MethaneSAT satellite zooms around the Earth 15 times a day and searches for leaks of methane, the invisible gas that has been warming the planet.

title: Israel Backs Adani After US Bribery Allegations, Israeli Envoy Says
content: Israel wants India's Adani Group to continue to invest in the country, Israel's envoy to India said on Thursday, affirming the nation's support to the portstomedia
summary: Israel wants India's Adani Group to continue to invest in the country, Israel's envoy to India said on Thursday, affirming the nation's support to the portstomedia

title: Donald Trump's Tariff Talk Spurs Global Jitters, Countries May "Retaliate"
content: Donald Trump's tariff threats have rattled foreign businesses and governments, with many fearing it could signal the opening salvo of an all-out trade war when he returns to the White House next year.
summary: Donald Trump's tariff threats have rattled foreign businesses and governments, with many fearing it could signal the opening salvo of an all-out trade war when he returns to the White House next year.

title: 90 Victims Identified In New Probe Against Harrods Owner Mohamed Al-Fayed
content: Over 400 women and witnesses have alleged sexual misconduct against late Harrods owner Mohamed Al-Fayed, sparking scrutiny of how the London police force handled complaints stretching back decades.
summary: Over 400 women and witnesses have alleged sexual misconduct against late Harrods owner Mohamed Al-Fayed, sparking scrutiny of how the London police force handled complaints stretching back decades.

title: Woman In China Makes Rs 35 Lakh In 3 Months From 'Flash' Marriages
content: A matchmaking scam in China has exploited single men through "flash marriages," where women posed as brides and vanished after receiving hefty bride prices.
summary: A matchmaking scam in China has exploited single men through "flash marriages," where women posed as brides and vanished after receiving hefty bride prices.

title: National And International Events In December 2024: List Of Important Days
content: December is filled with festivities, holidays, and commemorations, making it a time for cultural observance and historical reflection.
